title: Eliesa Katoa
text:
Eliesa Katoa (born 3 January 2000) is a Tongan professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a forward for the <a href="New%20Zealand%20Warriors">New Zealand Warriors</a> in the <a href="National%20Rugby%20League">NRL</a>.
Playing career.
Katoa made his NRL debut in round 1 of the <a href="2020%20NRL%20season">2020 NRL season</a> for the <a href="New%20Zealand%20Warriors">New Zealand Warriors</a> against <a href="Newcastle%20Knights">Newcastle Knights</a> starting from the bench, in the 20–0 loss. He scored his first try in the Warriors' 18–0 win over the <a href="St.%20George%20Illawarra%20Dragons">St. George Illawarra Dragons</a> in round 3 of the same season.
